user.description: Enhanced and standard are short range loops. Standard has a white background. Enhanced has a topo background and configurable loop length. Mosaic is for regions or whole US.
user.title: Choose style of radar

standard_enhanced.description: Configure a station and radar type. Choose radar loops or static images.
standard_enhanced.title: Configure NWS Radar

mosaic.description: Configure a station. Choose radar loops or static images.
mosaic.title: Configure NWS Radar
